modName: Ice Blade of the Monarch Resurrection
summary: Ice Blade of the Monarch mod
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00]Ice Blade of the Monarch Resurrection[/color] Eng/Rus

[color=#ffff00]Authors[/color]:
Ronnie Magnum - mesh, textures, adaptation, screenshots
9RedMen - facedata generation, navmeshes

[color=#ffff00]Version[/color]: 1.1
[color=#ffff00]Requirements[/color]: Skyrim

This mod adds Ice Blade of the Monarch, an ancient artifact sword from TES3: Morrowind. It can be obtained in Fort Greymoor, not far from Whiterun.

***

[color=#ffff00]!!!USE ONLY 1 ESP-FILE!!![/color]

***
